forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle touch of sunlight breaks through the typical gray shroud, revealing a day promising warmth and clarity. While predominantly sunny, the lingering whispers of fog, ever so familiar to this iconic skyline, retreat just enough to highlight the delicate outlines of the Golden Gate and the sprawling city below. By afternoon, temperatures will soften slightly, inviting a casual comfort that beckons one to roam along the waterfront or find solace in a cozy café tucked away from the brisk breeze that whips through city streets.

The winds, playful yet fortifying, dance around at 12 to 22 miles per hour, adding a refreshing edge to the warmth of the day. It’s a moment to reach for layers: a light jacket and comfortable attire will serve as partners for exploration, whether it's a stroll through the Ferry Building or a conversation with friends in a hidden park. As the sun starts its descent, the evening will comfortably settle around 54 degrees, offering a serene transition into nighttime. With the city’s artistic life alive and buzzing, this is no time to be idle; rather, relish the clever balance of nature’s gifts and immerse yourself in the moments that define a San Francisco afternoon.
